revised_title: The Magnetic Storm of December 16-17, 1917: A Comparative Study of Observations at Kew and Eskdalemuir Observatories
tldr: This study compares the magnetic storm of December 16-17, 1917, as recorded at Kew and Eskdalemuir observatories. The disturbance was the largest of the year, with notable differences in the changes recorded at the two observatories. The study focuses on the oscillations with periods of about 20 minutes and their correlation with the magnetic field measurements.
